title: Bug 116564 - Hyperlink builder title changes with settings
description: The title of hyperlink builder should remain consistent as 'Hyperlink Options' but currently changes with settings.
OB: Upon clicking 'OK' and reopening the hyperlink builder, the title is observed to change to 'www.actuate.com'.
EB: The expected behavior is that the title of the hyperlink builder should always be 'Hyperlink Options', irrespective of the settings changes.
SR:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Click on 'OK'.
2. Reopen the hyperlink builder.

Actual result: The title becomes 'www.actuate.com'.
Expected result: Hyperlink builder title should be 'Hyperlink Options'.
